scope-highlighter.startDelimeter.description: the string that will be used to delimit start of scope

scope-highlighter.endDelimeter.description: the string that will be used to delimit end of scope

scope-highlighter.singleLineComment.description: the prefix that creates a comment line

scope-highlighter.multiLineCommentStart.description: the symbols used to start multiline comment blocks in your language

scope-highlighter.multiLineCommentEnd.description: the symbols used to end multiline comment blocks in your language

scope-highlighter.red.description: the red value for the RGBA highlighting (0-255)

scope-highlighter.green.description: the green value for the RGBA highlighting (0-255)

scope-highlighter.blue.description: the blue value for the RGBA highlighting (0-255)

scope-highlighter.alpha.description: the alpha value (opacity) for the RGBA highlighting (0.0-1.0)
